name: Busstop love match
description:
"Busstop Love Match" follows a young man as he meets the girl of his dreams while waiting for the bus. 

The entire game takes place in the 10 minutes between meeting this young beauty and the bus arriving. Can you start a conversation with her? will she be nice to you? are sparks gonna fly? It's all up to you.

Protagonist:
You play as a customizable protagonist who goes to school but doesn't think too hard about it. He is a bit of an introvert, who is unable to talk to girls at the best of times.
It's up to you as a player to spark a conversation with the cutest girl you've ever met: Adrienne.

Adrienne:
Adrienne is a spunky girl with a lot of energy, that the protagonist meets while waiting for the bus. She is a bit mysterious and certainly not all that she seems. It's up to you as a player to make this girl fall in love with you.

  • immersive visual novel gameplay
  • A beautiful blossoming romance storyline
  • Fully illustrated Cg's
  • 1 unique and interesting romancable character
  • 4 unique endings all, based on player choice
  • 14.000 words of a unique and cute story
